content: पैत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (त्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पितुरिदं अण्] {@--1@} Relating to a father or ancestors generally, paternal, ancestral. {@--2@} Sacred to the Manes. --त्रं {@--1@} The part of the hand between the forefinger and the thumb. (Also पैत्र्प in this sense). {@--2@} A year, month, or day sacred to the Pitṛs.
